To add a new icon with the free version of icomoon.io

# Go to https://icomoon.io/app/#/select
# Import a project by selecting icomoon_import.json
# Add the icons you need to to your selection
# Generate the font
# Download the font
# Extract the font to this folder
# run the batch file rename_files_fix_demo.bat (Requires Powershell, Move, Ren, Del and RMDir which should be on any modern windows machine by default)
# Copy the files to dsicollection\DsiLibraries\DSI.Online.MVC\Content\fonts\fontfiles
